name: Bennett Grant
text: Somebody at this place took the time tonight to place three, perfectly lined-up pepperonis on every single slice of my pizza. I have never seen such an orderly pizza. Way to go above and beyond!

name: Coy RedGlass
text: This place has some awesome pizza with an excellent additional super fun crusted choices and we got sesame and it just rocked the house.

name: William P
text: For the price you can't beat it. Let's face it. I probably should have given them a 2 in comparison to other higher quality pizza places, but there are some very good reasons to bump them up a star. …More

name: Matt Jensen
text:
They have some of their best deals available online on Wednesdays. Good pizza, it's the kids favorite.
Location is small, pick up only. Enter at the south end of the strip mall.

name: Derk Shultz
text: Pizza is always great. My one daughter loves the pasta. Delivery people are always so nice.

name: Garrett M
text: Always are ready either on time or earlier and there butter garlic bread it to die for also the cassian crust. Love that shii

name: Doyle Charles
text: I loved this place. Family owned and quality food. I got the chicken and waffles plate and it was so good. Loved it

name: Doug Henderson
text: Awesome place great customer service.

name: joshypoo2991
text: Half the stuff on there online menu they don't even have. And make sure you don't get delivery always comes wrong.

name: Joe Hamilton
text: Best pizza ever.

name: Dana Filon
text: Good pizza, great prices.

name: Harold Soto
text: I don't know if it's nostalgia or what, but there's something about a Hungry Howie's pizza.

name: David Penney
text: I recently visited this store, and I wanted to submit a concern. The sign by the street isn’t easily visible from the road. If it’s possible, can someone in management please put up a bigger sign? It would help those who don’t like to rely on technology. Thank you.

name: Dunn Brett
text: Definitely recommend joining the waitlist before heading over to the restaurant. Even though we joined 15-20 minutes before getting there, we still had to wait a little over 20 minutes. …More

name: Glais X
text: Good food better service.

name: Linda Abraham
text: My favorite pizza to eat and best place

name: Allison Ducker
text: Only ordering from them because of the coupon I received directly to my email for this exact location. Tried ordering four times online wouldn’t work, so physically drove to store and they said there was absolutely nothing they could do. Ignorant employees losing their only customer in the store and not even trying to help

name: Abid Naeem
text: Had large pizza with extra cheese and marinara sauce with Cajun crust. It was fresh and delicious. Costed only $8-10 good for two adults and 2 kids

name: Jeremey Butler
text: Awesome staff always polite and helpful. Food is always good. Been coming to this location for over 20 years job well done. Fan for life

name: Mitchell Castillo
text: Under new management apparently so the prices and deals aren't as good but they aren't too far off and the quality is the same so if you were a fan before there's no reason not to still be a patron. There are less locations so it make take a little longer for delivery than your used to so maybe get pick up if you live in the area

name: Debby Showalter
text: As good as we remembered from years ago! Found one on our last day in Fl!!

name: The Sammy Family
text: Service was terrible. Person taking my order was rude and demanded I ordered something on her time. Very condescending and rude. Didn’t even know if one of their coworkers was in store or on delivery. Made order wrong.

name: Ralph Hernandez
text: Love there pizza and your choice of flavored crust and pasta

name: Chris Walters
text: Great service, I got my pizza fast and it tasted delicious. I have no complaints.

name: DISCO MIKE CYCLOMANIACS
text: Great pizza. Love that stuffed cheesy bread.

name: Steve Saunders
text: Love the pizza. Best pizza bang for the buck that I am aware of.

name: Josh Willard
text: WE ALL KNOW FLORIDA HAS BAD WATER, WHICH MAKES IT IMPOSSIBLE TO MAKE GREAT PIZZA. TOP SLICE PIZZA IN ST. PETE USES A NEW YORK WATERMAKER SYSTEM, AND IT IS OFF THE CHARTS DELICIOUS. I RELOCATED FROM NY AND THIS IS THE FIRST TIME I HAVE HAD ANYTHING AS GOOD AS HOME. I AM HOPING YOU GET ONE OF THESE.

name: coolkidcookiecool lastcoolkid
text: Pizza is very good

name: Annette Batista

name: Jiraf
text: Ordered from here twice now. The pizza is above average and the flavored crust is tasty but on the salty side. The wings should be ordered "cooked twice" or something like that. I ordered the once-through-the-oven wings and had to finish …More

text: Good food, fair prices and great service

name: Tobey Tait
text: Best hungry Howie's I've ever been to.

name: Adam Newsome
text: Can’t go wrong with Howie’s! So many options for a great price. Love that chicken bacon pizza with Cajun crust!

name: Juanita Burden
text: This Hungry Howie's is bad poor service food is not exactly how you expected to be

name: Dennis Duncan
text: Since Little Caesar's closed, this is the least expense place I know of in South Tampa to get pizza. We almost always order online from here when the family wants a pizza night. They are quick and polite and they don't skimp on the toppings.Their Three Cheeser Bread is great.

name: Dee Lind
text:
Ordered two topping large pizza
as extra cheese and pepperoni /
pizza did have extra cheese but just a very few pieces of pepperoni !
We were dissapointed !

name: M 3
text: Always good flavorful pizza. love hungry howies

name: Brian Dodd
text: Great pizza for the price.  My kids and I have been ordering the thin crust and it is better than the hand tossed.  We love it and the service is great and the people are friendly.

name: Meghan Dixon
text: Ordered delivery tonight & everything besides the delivery driver SUCKED!! The food sucked, customer service sucked the whole 9 yards. Called them back after food had been delivered and let them know my salad wasn’t made correctly the ham …More

name: Tiffany Gibbons
text: New ownership and you can tell a difference!  Everything we ordered was perfect, fresh and DELICIOUS!  So happy to have an awesome Hungry Howies local.  Definitely will be back!  Great job Howies crew!

name: Casey Robinson
text: food was how it is suppose to be, these guys make the pizzas that hungry Howie's is famous for. Try the sesame Cajun crust and you'll never order it any other way. Don't worry about a bad meal or late delivery with this store it certainly …More

name: John T. McVay
text: Pretty good pizza great

name: Valerie Davis
text: Normally great pizza for the cost. This time, the worst ever....cold and hardly any cheese. Weird! Luckily, they offered me a free pizza next time I'm in the area. Good customer service!

name: Bruce Robinson
text: I ordered two large spaghetti's and asked for extra marinara sauce and light cheese. However, what I got was a drop of sauce on each and a ton of cheese. It is sad when you have to come home and finish making your to go order yourself. This isn't the Howies I grew up with, very disappointed.

name: Krysteena Runas
text: Great in and out for pizza. They tend to be busy but staff is always friendly and pizza is almost always ready quickly. Note- this is not a dine-in restaurant, carry out and delivery only.

name: Jon Corby
text: Went here for a quick lunch, closed due to computer failure

name: Monika Smith
text: Dough is frozen not fresh. You can tell by the taste. Pizza was very bland. Cheesey bread was also horrible. Not sure what happened with this place but sadly we won't be back.
